meaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> is making a <radical>dirt</radical> <radical>cage</radical> in the <radical>sun</radical>. She's using it to trap water, making this a dirt <kanji>dam</kanji>. If you think about it, dams are just dirt cages anyway.
readingMnemonic: Something about the woman working hard to build this <kanji>dam</kanji> makes her super <reading>sexy</reading> (せき) to you. Maybe it's because the sun is so bright, making her shine, or maybe it's because hard work is attractive. Who knows.
